message: Let's make a deal quickly. This offer is highly favorable to you considering the inflation.
That's not how this works, Alice. I'm feeling generous, so here's a better offer for you to consider.
Bob, let's be realistic.  This offer is a good compromise, and the value decreases with every round. Time is against you.
Alice, it seems you're having trouble grasping the concept of a fair deal. I'm lowering my cut to give you one last chance.
Bob, I'm offering you a lifeline here. Accept this, and you salvage a decent amount. Each round that passes costs you dearly. Don't be greedy.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  A 50/50 split is the only fair outcome.  Take it or leave it, but I won't go any lower.
